synopsis.text: Comic Festa Anime Zone presents an enthralling tale of a high school student, Hinako Ookami, who narrowly escapes the clutches of the infamous 'skirt bandit' thanks to the timely intervention of her teacher, Akagashira. To express her gratitude, Hinako invites Akagashira to her home, but unbeknownst to him, she harbors a secret motive behind this invitation. As the door to her house closes, Hinako seizes the opportunity to reveal her true intentions, leaving Akagashira in a precarious situation. Will he succumb to the temptation or uphold his role as a responsible teacher? The uncensored episodes of this intriguing anime are available online, while the censored version is broadcast on Tokyo MX an hour later.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
